## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the README.md if needed
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for new functions

### Dependencies
- [ ] I have checked that no new dependencies were added unnecessarily
- [ ] If dependencies were added, I have documented why they are needed

### Performance
- [ ] I have considered the performance impact of my changes
- [ ] I have tested my changes with realistic data volumes

### Security
- [ ] I have considered security implications
- [ ] No sensitive data is exposed or logged
- [ ] Input validation is implemented where needed
